name: Scrape LinkedIn Profile (Person) and Store in Google Sheets
description:
This template allows you to scrape a persons LinkedIn profile. You can scrape all information including experience, education and recent activities. You can also scrape contact information in case the LinkedIn user has this information publically available or if you are a connection with the person.

I created this google sheets template that can get you started, simply make a copy of this sheet and use that in all of the Google Sheets modules.

You can find it here:
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ab2XRld9tm-kIBFBcssRsMIrVLnEp8xaRjf_KX2S4KA/edit?gid=1310390410#gid=1310390410
